 ACADEMIC PROJECT REPORT:-
Mechanical Load Distributor
Description
 
 ;-   It is simply a device which is made to improve the working ability and load carrying 
capacity with an efficient manner. This device is made by taking labour as a main concentration point 
or directly we can say it is only for the labour use. Load distributer will distribute overall load onto the 
shoulders and the stress which concentrate on the head only will distribute onto the shoulder and it 
divides equally on the shoulders.
